Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Indicates the transaction should process to completion before the response is generated.  Note: All < v12 operations will process with Run_Now = True for backwards compatibility but please review this setting in your environment for performance conditions.

Enforces all validation conditions defined on the initiation step.  If any condition is true, the validation error blocks the step from exiting and a business process event isn't created. The attribute is currently not available for use. It will be generally available for all web services in a future release.

validation.validation: Discard on Exit Validation Error

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

WorkerObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: To bundle a program of study, ensure that it’s configured as addable to the program to which it’s bundled.

Add_Program_of_Study_Event_Data.description: Valid Program of Study Add Data

validation.validation: Enter a program of study that has not been declared.
Enter an approved program of study.
Unable to add a Program Focus to a Student without the Parent Program of Study.
Expected Completion Date must be greater than the Declare Date.
When a program of study has a parent program of study, you can only bundle it with its parent program.
You cannot bundle an advisory program of study with another program.
To bundle programs of study, ensure that the student has the program to bundle with.
Ensure that each program of study is added only once for a student.
You must bundle programs of study that cannot stand alone as the student’s only educational objective with a program that can.
To specify a program of study as primary, ensure that it belongs in a category that can stand alone as the student's only educational objective.
Specify only 1 program of study as primary.
Enter an Expected Completion Date that matches the expected completion date of the program it's bundled with.
You can bundle only programs that cannot stand alone as the student’s only educational objective with programs that can.
The student doesn't meet the entry requirements for one or more of the programs specified.
Add at least 1 program focus that is required for this program of study and bundle it with this program.
Select a program of study that matches the student’s institution.

Add_Program_of_Study_Event_Data.description: Contain Student Program of Study Record Declare Date

description: Add Program of Study Event Data

validation.validation: You can only add programs when you have at least 1 program in progress.
Submit either Student Reference or Academic Record Reference.

You can't add a program of study for a student when any of these events are in progress: Add, Change, Make Primary, or Remove Program of Study, Change Expected Program Completion Date, Institutional Withdrawal, Leave of Absence, and Conferral Request.
To add a program of study to an academic record, ensure that the primary program of study is not discontinued.
A future dated program of study action already exists. You can’t add or change a program of study until that action is either effective or canceled.
Specify an Academic Record Reference. If you're using a version before v30.0 of the web service operation, update to the latest version.
